AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: abandoned child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: One of a few namekian babies sent off planet to escape the disaster that almost drove Old Namek to extiction about 500 years ago, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on the planet [PAWN_pronoun] happened to land in, with little to no idea of [PAWN_possessive] true origins.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seeker of youth
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a being of pure evil, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up to be a ruthless warrior and leader. Later on [PAWN_pronoun] formed [PAWN_possessive] own space fleet and took off in search of eternal youth, for [PAWN_possessive] natural lifetime does not seem to be enough to achieve [PAWN_possessive] vast ambitions.
